cu.explanation_en: Setting tr_s_preference to 'invalid' (unknown enum) will cause transport preference configuration failure and gNB initialization error.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_frequencyBand to 999 (invalid band number) will cause frequency band configuration error and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_frequencyBand 設定為 999（無效頻帶編號）會導致頻帶配置錯誤，並造成小區設定失敗。
